page.title: 09LIFE STYLES (CONT)
page.content:
MRS PULLAN (cont)
Mrs Pullan said she didn't know much history about her shop.Most of her customers came directly from the village.She said she didn't have the faintest idea whether her shop would change in the future,but when she goes the shop goes with her.The Social Clubs she runs are;the Golden Oldies over Sixties club,which was held once or twice a week.She also held womens Institutes and so on.There are three or four fetes held every year,also she told us the fete is traditional or for charity or other uses.They do not have any floats at the fete but they have all sorts of things going on like;tombola, a fancy dress parade and lots more.Nothing could be changed according to her.There is a toddler group but no schools in Landbeach.
